snippet: Two Americans and three Afghans died just days after Pentagon officials confirmed that joint operations between American and Afghan forces were returning to normal.
abstract: Two Americans and three Afghans are killed in pitched battle between soldiers of the two sides; coalition and Afghan officials offer differing explanations for how clash started.
lead_paragraph: Two Americans and three Afghans died just days after Pentagon officials confirmed that joint operations between American and Afghan forces were returning to normal.

headline.seo: 5 Dead After Clash Between U.S. and Afghan Troops
headline.main: 5 Are Dead After Clash Between U.S. and Afghan Troops
headline.print_headline: 5 Dead in Murky Attack Involving U.S. and Afghan Troops
